body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us. My name is Christian Evans and I am from TechSolutions. May I ask for your name please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Ruth. Can you please provide me with your date of birth in the format day month year?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it is two eight zero six one nine nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Ruth. And may I have your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it is zero seven five five eight three two one four seven six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information, Ruth. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Ruth. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
